Ingredients

Top Sirloin 1 pound
Salt 1 unit
Black Pepper 1 unit

Recipe

Estimated Time: 138 Minutes

Rub the 1 pound Top Sirloin with Salt Black Pepper
Timer 60 minutes Dry brine at least an hour in the fridge
Timer 60 minutes Souvide steak at 127 degrees
Timer 1 minute Souvide steak on largest side
Timer 1 minute Souvide steak on 2nd largest side
Timer 30 seconds Souvide steak on 3rd largest side
Timer 30 seconds Souvide steak on 4th largest side
Timer 15 minutes Let steak sit for at least 15 min
